'''No Favorites''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Prepare for Trouble]] on the island of [[Twins of Nerechtemeresch]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Hide at least one body in both the red and the blue bush.</big>
